product_name: Hi-Tec Sienna Waterproof Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and flexible, the Hi-Tec Sienna Waterproof Women's Shoes deliver long-lasting comfort plus waterproof protection to keep your feet warm and dry even on muddy trails. Suede leather uppers with nylon mesh underlays offer durable, flexible support; waterpoof, breathable membranes keep feet dry without letting them overheat. Synthetic linings wick moisture away from feet for added comfort. Antimicrobial Ortholite(R) insoles fight odor and provide cushioning; EVA midsoles add additional cushioning and support. Supportive fork shanks extend the length of each shoe for lasting support during long hikes. Durable rubber outsoles provide reliable traction on uneven trails. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and flexible, the Hi-Tec Sienna Waterproof Women's Shoes deliver long-lasting comfort plus waterproof protection to keep your feet warm and dry even on muddy trails.
